mapper.insert: insert ignore ai_doc (ai_doc_id, ai_doc_pwd, ai_doc_age, ai_doc_sex, ai_doc_name, ai_doc_unit, ai_doc_department, ai_doc_phone, ai_doc_superior_id, ai_doc_patient_num, ai_doc_photo, ai_user_type, ai_id_card) values (#{aiDocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiDocPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiDocAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aiDocSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiDocName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiDocUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiDocDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiDocPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiDocSuperiorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiDocPatientNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aiDocPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiUserType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ai_doc set ai_doc_pwd = #{aiDocPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_age = #{aiDocAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ai_doc_sex = #{aiDocSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_name = #{aiDocName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_unit = #{aiDocUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_department = #{aiDocDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_phone = #{aiDocPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_superior_id = #{aiDocSuperiorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_patient_num = #{aiDocPatientNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ai_doc_photo = #{aiDocPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_user_type = #{aiUserType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_id_card = #{aiIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ai_doc_id = #{aiDocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ai_doc_id, ai_doc_pwd, ai_doc_age, ai_doc_sex, ai_doc_name, ai_doc_unit, ai_doc_department, ai_doc_phone, ai_doc_superior_id, ai_doc_patient_num, ai_doc_photo, ai_user_type, ai_id_card from ai_doc where ai_doc_id = #{aiDocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ai_doc_id, ai_doc_pwd, ai_doc_age, ai_doc_sex, ai_doc_name, ai_doc_unit, ai_doc_department, ai_doc_phone, ai_doc_superior_id, ai_doc_patient_num, ai_doc_photo, ai_user_type, ai_id_card from ai_doc
mapper.update: update ai_doc set ai_doc_age = #{aiDocAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ai_doc_sex = #{aiDocSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_name = #{aiDocName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_unit = #{aiDocUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_department = #{aiDocDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_phone = #{aiDocPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_superior_id = #{aiDocSuperiorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_doc_patient_num = #{aiDocPatientNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ai_doc_photo = #{aiDocPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ai_id_card = #{aiIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ai_doc_id = #{aiDocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
